sentences.english: It has the consistency of green bean paste.
sentences.chinese: 糌粑的黏度和綠豆沙差不多，味道也有點像。

sentences.english: In the house my mother was roasting barley and heard me.
sentences.chinese: 我媽媽在家炒糌粑，聽到了我的歌聲。

sentences.english: Adopting fuzzy mathematics, the paper evaluated synthetically the quality of Tibetan parched flour made from different feed proportioning.
sentences.chinese: 應用模糊數學的方法綜合評價糌粑感官質量。

definition: butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
a kind of a flat bread
to stuff one's face/to eat greedily
hand-held mutton (mutton pieces on the bone, eaten with the fingers)
pilaf (rice dish popular in many parts of the world, including Xinjiang)/pilau

a kind of rice-flour noodles from Yunnan province
